channel.title: Slimmed Down GitHub YAML Updates
channel.description: A feed of updated YAML files from GitHub

item.title: Week 39: Updated Rules (Part 1/1)
item.description:
Updated rules this week:
Name: ADFS DKM Master Key Export (Version: 1.2.1)
ID: 18e6a87e-9d06-4a4e-8b59-3469cd49552d

Name: Gain Code Execution on ADFS Server via SMB + Remote Service or Scheduled Task (Version: 1.2.1)
ID: 12dcea64-bec2-41c9-9df2-9f28461b1295

Name: Microsoft Entra ID Health Service Agents Registry Keys Access (Version: 1.1.5)
ID: 06bbf969-fcbe-43fa-bac2-b2fa131d113a

Name: Midnight Blizzard - Script payload stored in Registry (Version: 1.1.5)
ID: 00cb180c-08a8-4e55-a276-63fb1442d5b5

Name: Possible Forest Blizzard attempted credential harvesting - Sept 2020 (Version: 3.0.0)
ID: 04384937-e927-4595-8f3c-89ff58ed231f

Name: Potential Kerberoasting (Version: 1.1.7)
ID: 1572e66b-20a7-4012-9ec4-77ec4b101bc8

Name: Windows Binaries Executed from Non-Default Directory (Version: 1.0.4)
ID: 15049017-527f-4d3b-b011-b0e99e68ef45

Name: Known Forest Blizzard group domains - July 2019 (Version: 1.6.1)
ID: 074ce265-f684-41cd-af07-613c5f3e6d0d
